strings.Value: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} Iomedae may grand a divine boon to a willing mortal who approaches divinity. The target immediately gains a +6 untyped {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to any one {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} of its choice, a +4 untyped bonus to any other ability score of its choice, and the Darkvision ability.
